snippet: The International Atomic Energy Agency adopted a measure that rebuked Iran for defying demands to curb its uranium enrichment and expressed concern about its nuclear advances.
abstract: International Atomic Energy Agency passes a resolution rebuking Iran for defying demands to curb its uranium enrichment and failing to quell concerns about its suspected nuclear weapons research.
lead_paragraph: The International Atomic Energy Agency adopted a measure that rebuked Iran for defying demands to curb its uranium enrichment and expressed concern about its nuclear advances.

headline.seo: U.N. Nuclear Watchdog Passes Resolution on Iran
headline.main: U.N. Agency Rebukes Iran for Failing to Cooperate
headline.print_headline: U.N. Agency Rebukes Iran For Failing To Cooperate
